name: Shouty Bird
description:
This was my first game, a game jam game for Philly Dev Night's Unusual Input Jam in 2014.

I'm a little sentimental about it.

The mic control is a little wonky. A good "HA" typically works best, but yell too loud and you'll rocket into the ceiling. You can also press space to jump if that's more your style.

Play in windowed, there's no command to exit this!
